public.homepage.regroup.title: Group
public.homepage.regroup.subTitle: Add your co-workers, your relations and your friends to your Amplement professional network.
public.homepage.collaborate.title: Live collaborate
public.homepage.collaborate.privateGroup: Create as many private groups as you want to communicate with your team, your co-workers, your colleagues, your professional relations, or even your family.
Create public groups for all Amplement users to work together or share professional experiences.
public.homepage.chattingWithPro.title: Communicate with professionals
public.homepage.chattingWithPro.realTime: Add your professional relations to your Amplement network to communicate privately and follow tons of live events (a contact is signing in, is visiting your profile, is sending you a message…).
Carry on with your conversations even when your contacts are no longer online. They will be directly saved in your messages.

public.aboutUs.title: About us
public.aboutUs.whatAmplement.text: Amplement is a professional social network to live communicate and collaborate with professionals from all around the world. With more than half a million of members, Amplement has turned into a key professional tool.
public.aboutUs.whoAreWe.text: We are a fast-growing startup composed of the best web experts. We aim at providing you with the best web collaboration and social networking tools.
public.aboutUs.contactUs.text: To contact us, dial +33(0)1.85.09.04.32 (Monday to Friday, from 9 am to 6 pm) for a specific question or to ask more information.
public.contactUs.title: Contact us
public.contactUs.subTitle: To contact us, you can dial +33(0)1.85.09.04.32 (Monday to Friday, from 9 am to 6 pm) or use the contact form available on the right side.
